get.summary: Verifies the user's primary email for FusionAuth

parameters.name: verification_id
parameters.description: The verification id

post.summary: Resend the user's primary email verification for FusionAuth
Generates an email link for the user to verify their email address.

get.summary: Verifies the user's email for a user profile

parameters.name: verification_id
parameters.description: The verification id

get.summary: Health check

Generates a macro-api-token using the user's macro-access-token
You can either have your access token in the cookies or in the request
headers
Authorization: Bearer <access_token>
This returns a new macro-api-token

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: The email to generate the macro-api-token for. If not provided, we use your default profile.

post.summary:
Refreshes a JWT token
You can either have your access token and refresh token in the cookies or in the request
headers
Authorization: Bearer <access_token>
x-macro-refresh-token: <refresh_token>
This returns the cookies with the new access and refresh token
Initiates a link for a user

get.summary: Initiates an SSO login

parameters.name: idp_name
parameters.description: The name of the identity provider to use for login. e.g Google

parameters.name: idp_id
parameters.description: **OPTIONAL**. The idp id of the identity provider to use for login.

parameters.name: login_hint
parameters.description: **OPTIONAL**. The user's email.

parameters.name: original_url
parameters.description: **OPTIONAL**. The original url you came from.

parameters.name: is_mobile
parameters.description: **OPTIONAL**. If the authentication request is from a mobile device.

post.summary:
Creates a merge request used to verify the user's email address in order to merge their
accounts.
This is different than generate_email_link which is used to verify a new email address to add a
new profile to a user's account.

get.summary: Verifies the merge request

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The code

get.summary: Handles oauth redirect

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Code

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email

get.summary: Handles oauth redirect
Custom OAuth2 callback

parameters.name: provider
parameters.description: The provider to use

get.summary: Gets all permissions
Gets a list of the users permissions
Performs a login via session code

parameters.name: session_code
parameters.description: The session code

get.summary: Joins a team by accepting an invite.

parameters.name: team_invite_id
parameters.description: The team invite id

delete.summary: Rejects an invitation to join a team.

parameters.name: team_invite_id
parameters.description: The team invite id

get.summary: Gets all teams for the authenticated user.
Gets all of a user's invitations.
Gets a team by ID.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team to retrieve

delete.summary:
Deletes a team.
This will update all team members roles and cancel your subscription for the team.
This action is **irreversible** and you will not be able to recover the team afterwards.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team to delete

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team to update

post.summary: Invites a user to a team.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team to invite to

get.summary: Gets all invites for a team.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team to get invites for

post.summary: Regenerates a team invite notifying the user again.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team to invite to

parameters.name: team_invite_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team invite to reinvite

delete.summary: Removes a user from a team.

parameters.name: team_id
parameters.description: The ID of the team to invite to

parameters.name: remove_user_id
parameters.description: The ID of the user to remove

get.summary:
Gets the calling user's info which matches what was given in the **deprecated**
getUserPermissions query in our graphql api.
This will eventually be removed and optimized to use smaller calls that grab
what is needed for various parts of the UI.
Returns whether or not a given idp link exists for a user

parameters.name: idp_name
parameters.description: The idp name to lookup. If not provided, the idp_id must be provided.

parameters.name: idp_id
parameters.description: The idp id to lookup. If not provided, the idp_name must be provided.

get.summary: Gets the calling user's info

delete.summary: Deletes the user who calls this endpoint

get.summary: Retrieves the name of a particular user.

put.summary: Sets the name of a particular user

parameters.name: first_name
parameters.description: First Name of user

parameters.name: last_name
parameters.description: Last Name of user

get.summary:
Retrieves the users organization if present.
Returns NO_CONTENT if the user is a not part of an organization.

put.summary: Sets the profile picture URL for a particular user

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: profile picture URL

post.summary: Retrieves profile picture URLs for a list of users

get.summary:
Retrieves the users quota.
Returns NO_CONTENT if the user is a premium user with no quota.

email.description: The email address to generate the merge link for.

CreateTeamRequest.description: The request body to create a new team

CreateUserRequest.description:
The request body to create a new user in fusionauth
NOTE: Never derive debug here as we don't want to accidentally log the password

email.description:
The primary email address of the user.
This will be the user's root "profile".

password.description:
The password for the user.
TODO: configure password policy and validate password before attempting to create user

username.description: The unique username for the user.

EmptyResponse.description: Empty response is required due to custom fetch forcing `response.json()`

ErrorResponse.description:
A plain old json error response for use with axum.
yup, thats it.

email.description: The email address to resend the verification email to

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

hasChromeExt.description: Whether the user has the chrome extension

hasTrialed.description: Whether the user has trialed through stripe

tutorialComplete.description: Whether the user has completed the tutorial

organization_id.description: The user's organization id if there is one associated with the user

InviteToTeamRequest.description: The request body to invite a user to a team

emails.description: The emails of the users you want to invite to the team

email.description: The email to initiate passwordless authentication for

redirect_uri.description: The redirect uri to redirect to after login

PatchTeamRequest.description: The request body to update a team

name.description: The new name of the team

group.description: The group to add the user to

firstName.description: The first name of the user

lastName.description: The last name of the user

tutorialComplete.description: If the user has completed the tutorial

email.description: The email address to resend the verification email to

idp_id.description: The idp_id you need to perform sso login with.

operation.description:
The operation to perform
`Update` will update the existing invitation role
`Remove` will remove the invitation

team_invite_id.description: The team invite id to update

oneOf.description:
The role to assign to the invited user
This is only used for `Update` operation

TeamRole.description: Ordered from least to most access top -> bottom

operation.description:
The operation to perform
`Update` will update the existing user role
`Remove` will remove the user

oneOf.description: The new role for the user if the operation is `Update`

user_id.description: The user id to update or remove

link_exists.description: Whether or not a link exists for the given idp

UserQuota.description: The UserQuota represents the user's current quota

ai_chat_messages.description: The user's total number of AI chat messages the user has sent.

documents.description: The user's total number of documents they have created.

max_ai_chat_messages.description: The maximum number of AI chat messages they can send.

max_documents.description: The maximum number of documents they can create.
